sources.title: Lone Wolves | Free Full Movie | Action Sci-Fi Thriller Movie
sources.description:
Lone Wolves | Free Full Movie | Action Sci-Fi Thriller Movie

After an apocalypse Pvt. James Conroy is left fighting mutant creatures and struggling to survive. When Conroy finds a satellite phone and contacts Garry Freeman, marooned in a space station, they hatch a dangerous plan to reach other survivors. 

*Review* - "Lone Wolves" (2016) is a dark sci-fi survival thriller in a post-apocalyptic universe that's overrun by mutant monsters. Pvt. James Conroy, who's one of the last remaining survivors known to be alive, fights to stay alive amidst the ruins of civilization. When he discovers a satellite phone, he calls Garry Freeman, an astronaut who's left stranded on a space station dying. They devise a desperate plan to find other survivors and fight against the horrors on Earth. With suspenseful action, dystopian settings, and non-stop mutant battles, Lone Wolves offers an intense blend of survival horror, sci-fi adventure, and post-apocalyptic action.

2016.  Stars: David Leeming, Warren Otteraa, Dan Purdey

metadata.Plot: After an apocalypse of questionable origin, Private James Conroy is living in an abandoned shack at the base of a radio tower. When Conroy finally contacts Garry Freeman, marooned in a space station, they have to learn to work together if they're going to save themselves, and maybe all of civilization.
metadata.Actors: David Leeming, Warren Otteraa, Dan Purdey
